name: mama kitchen NY
address: 67-25 Main St, Kew Gardens Hills, NY 11367, USA

reviews.text: The best service

THE BEST SHABBAT TAKE OUT
EVRYTHING IS FRESH MADE
EVEN THEY HAVE WINE ğŸ·
Arabic food will never be Israeli food. Just stop. Horrible tasting rendition here.

Mama Kitchen NY is a true hidden gem! From the moment I walked in, I felt like I was being welcomed into someoneâ€™s home. The atmosphere is warm and inviting, and the foodâ€”wow, the food is absolutely incredible.
I ordered the chicken shawarma platter, and it was bursting with flavor. The meat was perfectly seasoned and tender, the hummus was creamy and rich, and the fresh pita was the perfect complement. Every bite tasted homemade, like something passed down through generations.
What really stood out was the hospitality. The staff was so kind and attentive, making sure everything was just right. You can tell they genuinely care about their customers and take pride in serving authentic, high-quality food.
If you're looking for delicious Mediterranean comfort food in NYC, Mama Kitchen is a must-visit. I left full, happy, and already planning my next meal there. Highly recommend!

great place
helped me with shabbat food and everything was super tasty
i would recommend them to everyone

Mama Kitchen in Queens, NY is hands down one of the best dining experiences Iâ€™ve had in the city. From the moment you walk in, you're greeted with warm hospitality and the incredible aroma of spices that instantly transports you to the streets of Jerusalem or Tel Aviv.
The food? Absolutely phenomenal. I tried the cauliflower shawarma on frena bread, the eggplant carpaccio, and their signature hummus plateâ€”each dish was bursting with flavor and beautifully presented. You can tell everything is made with love and authenticity. The atmosphere is cozy and inviting, with a modern Middle Eastern vibe that makes you want to stay and savor every bite.
If you're in Queens and craving top-tier kosher Middle Eastern cuisine, Mama Kitchen is a must-visit. Whether you're a local or just passing through, this place is a gem that deserves all the praise!

Potentially one of the worst experiences Iâ€™ve had

They very rude and arrogant

The food was very strange tasting, as if it was old

Shameful to charge prices like this for poor quality food

Do not recommend

First time purchasing shabat food.
There are no prices on anything or anywhere and when you ask them they get impatient. Not sure why you need to ask, prices should be listed. The lady serving the food was rude and had no patience. I got some salads were which good. The rice on the stuffed onions were half uncooked. The fish balls were very smelly and tasted funny that I threw it away.
To sum it up, very expensive and not worth the price..I am all down for helping small businesses in our community but this was like a rip off to me. Better off getting from muscat or grill point

The food was delicious, and the server was incredibly accommodating. The kitchen did take a pretty long time for the main, and the music was a bit loud, but overall would definitely come again. The Syriah was amazing.
Arrived right before Shabbat to eat with my family got an amazing service and the food was more then great thank you very much Iâ€™ll definitely will come again
Delicious food! Very clean! Very nice people and great service!!! Thank you for a great food this Friday Morning
Great food!!!
The food was soo good everything was delicious and the waitress Paula was so nice the service is amazing here
I love the decor (throwback to a simpler time in Israel tho when was it ever simple?). Both the mama sabich and the Sinniya were just fantastic. Friendly and great service also.
Food tastes like leftovers from Friday
Amazing food! Excellent service and super fresh. Highly recommend everything on the menu itâ€™s super tasty and flavourful. Owned by amazing kind people. 100% Worth it!!! Run donâ€™t walk!!!
Great find. Everything was delicious. The meatballs were very original and the shakshuka was decent.

A++ in every aspect Mama Kitchen not only is amazing food and amazing service but the closest thing to the taste of Imaâ€™s(mother) food and dare I say it even a bit close to Savtaâ€™s (grandmother) food

-××™×–×™
-Izzie

literally the best restaurant I have been able to visit, the experience is unique, they make you feel like home, the decoration is very innovative and the food has no comparison, each flavor is unique and unmatched, 100% recommended

Amazing Place!!!
The food is incredible here!!!
Very Nice People here feels like home!!!

I recommend everyone to come to this place. The food is fresh and delicious. The bread is handmade. Hummus to die for. The staff is amazing and the owner is very nice and humble. Come taste their food!
Rita was very nice

Amazing Food!!!
Best place in town!!!
No one even comes close to this place!!!

Wow ğŸ‘Œ
Everything there is just delicious and so good.
If you didn't try yet, you must go there and try!
Very expensive and not great customer service. Pargiyot were very bland with no herbs (which, according to the menu, it was supposed to have)
Loved the bread and hummus!
Delicious food, friendly staff. Highly recommended!

This was one of the most delicious experiences Iâ€™ve had. Iâ€™m vegetarian and the appetizers were flavorful, and each unique in taste. The main dish I had (cauliflower shawarma on frena bread) was also flavorful and filling. Ah, and the hummus was unbelievable.

The young lady that served us was super hospitable and knowledgeable about the dishes, and recommended some great options.

Canâ€™t wait to go back there again.

the best  kosher israeli food ever in usa ğŸ‘

we was there for dinner and we definitely will back.

For sure one of  the best 3 kosher restaurants at New York !

Very high recommend just wow , Iâ€™m eat at a lot of kosher restaurants but this restaurant itâ€™s wow the food is wow so delicious the place are very beautiful , very inviting inside the vibe there are very special, like like like !!!

Great food and great service. We love middle eastern food and they specialize in a variety of dishes. The sandwiches are flavorful and the entrees are delicious. We ordered the Moroccan meatballs, stuffed peppers and 2 sandwiches.
Wow. This place is a taste of home. The flavored and atmosphere you canâ€™t describe in words. You must visit to understand.

Wow this place is amazing! The vibe, energy, and food was phenomenal. It was the first official night they were open so we got to taste most of the food and everything was delicious! The staff was so nice, responsive, and quick:) loved every moment!
Incredible dishes and service tonight! Food came in minutes and each dish tasted unique and delicious. Our waitress was also really sweet, didnâ€™t catch her name. Highly recommend! 5/5
Everything was delicious and so flavorful! The staff were nice and friendly. We had such a wonderful experience and we canâ€™t wait to come back.

Amazing place, delicious food, very recommended!
We came a group of 5 people and order variety of dishes, EVERYTHING was spectacular! the food is served in authentic dishes and so yummy.
The staff are very nice and the place is decorated with a relaxing vibe, we really enjoyed our time there.
This restaurant has very special food that you can't find anywhere else.
I'll be back with friends - so see you again soon :-)

Wow this people are genius they opened exactly what was missing in the area. Moroccan Shabbat takeout and dinner restaurant in the other days.and the both are super delicious. If you want to have food on Friday come exactly on 10am otherwise nothing left.
Highly recommended!!! They have some of the best food Iâ€™ve ever tasted. Love the vibes. Would definitely come back to Mama Kitchen.

This kosher (under supervision of the VHQ) restaurant mostly serves an Israeli Cuisine. It has some unusual and very interesting dishes on its menu, several of which I have never heard of before.
We have eaten at the restaurant twice and gotten take out twice. They do takeout only on Friday and do not do takeout the rest of the week. . Service is ok, but dishes sometimes take a while to come out from the kitchen, presumably because everything is made to order. Give yourself some extra time on Friday, because it takes the staff a bit of time to explain dishes to people.
This is our new favorite restaurant on Main Street and is highly recommended

Really good food, fast service, and excellent service. Was there just earlier tonight. even gave us an extra item for free, which was delicious as well. The Lamb was worth every dollar. Total order after tax was a little over 50 a person, and that is both an app and a main. Loved it
Delicious restaurant the ultimate experience well priced nice staff great ambiance.
Really great vibe with fantastic food. Highly recommend. Great local spot, makes you feel like you left queens with the ambiance.
Great place, nice vibe. Shabbat takeout food is delicious and flavorful!

Amazing food delicious, amazing service, very worm place .
Highly recommended
Great food . Good service . Different kind of food
Tasty Mediterranean style dishes, servings were tiny for my taste

I had the pleasure of trying the best kosher burger in Queens NY and it was simply outstanding. The patty was cooked to perfection and had a wonderful sweet flavor that made it stand out from other burger I've had. The toppings were also fresh and tasty, and the bun was toasted to perfection. I highly recommend trying the burger if you're a burger lover like me!

Food from the heavens! ğŸ˜
The taste and atmosphere are exactly like the name â€œmamaâ€™s kitchenâ€â€¦

First time we went it was amazing! Second time was a month later and it was hardly worth it. Not sure what happened but the second time the food was ordinary, portions were smaller, they didn't have the yerushalmi bread with sesame andâ€¦

Amazing place. The ambiance and service was unbeatable. Food was full of flavor and had unexpected combinations of Moroccan and Israeli cuisine. We stopped by for dinner and we thoroughly impressed. We will definitely be coming back.

Been there last night. Moroccan style feels like Marrakech.
Really good vibes, nice service, food was delicious.
I had the lamb, eggplant carpaccio, and the famous hummus.
Highly recommended. Definitely coming back.

Hands down the most amazing place I ever ate at!!!!
It reminded me of my mother and grandmother foo, so delicious I couldnâ€™t stop eating. Very homie and cozy and fun, great music and amazing staff. Great service and very accommodating. Best atmosphere youâ€™ll find
Overall 10 stars out of 5.
